title: Web Development
text: Develop Single-Page Application & Website using React.js, Next.js, Node.js, MongoDB/PostgreSQL, RESTful & GraphQL API.

title: Mobile App Development
text: Cross-Platform Mobile Applications using React-Native, Flutter. Also develop IOS platform specific app using SwiftUI.

title: Desktop App Development
text: Cross-Platform Desktop Software using Electron JS, Flutter. Also develop IOS platform specific app using SwiftUI.
